title: Mexico's Centavrvs re-makes 'Mańana No' for cowbell and guitar
teaser: The Centavrvs just played for several hundred people at the Spotify House stage at SXSW. Then, the Mexican band took a walk with us to a quiet corner down the street where they performed a stripped down, acoustic version of the band's song "Mańana No," using just cowbell and guitar.
contentencoded:
Thousands of people from around the world descend on Austin every March for SXSW. It's a conference where big thinkers come to share their ideas.

But, there's also the party. And, being Austin, there's a lot of live music.

Just east of the convention center, Swedish start-up Spotify took over a house and built a stage for a great line-up of artists. Included in the billing was Centavrvs, from Mexico City.

After peforming for hundreds of people, Centavrvs took a walk with us to a rare quiet corner where they played an acoustic version of their song "Mańana No" — in a sort of back of the envelope cow bell and guitar instrumentation.
